description:
While Rem`s father scolds him for dragging his feet on the grimoire, Ritsuka learns more about its shocking secrets from a new and unexpected source.
Source: Funimation

titles.title: Gensou to Junshin no Pas de Deux
Le Pas de deux des illusions et de l`innocence
Pas de Deux of Fantasy and Innocence
幻想と純真のパ・ド・ドゥ
